name: Skeletal Archer
description: Unearth a skeletal archer from the dirt to fight by your side for 16 seconds. The archer attacks the closest enemy every 2 seconds, dealing 796 Physical Damage.  Each time the archer deals damage, its next attack will do 5% more damage than the previous attack.  Creates a corpse on death.
effectLines: Converts into a Stamina ability and deals Physical Damage. The archer deals more damage with each attack.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Unearth a skeletal archer from the dirt to fight by your side for 16 seconds. The archer attacks the closest enemy every 2 seconds, dealing $1 Physical Damage.  Each time the archer deals damage, its next attack will do 5% more damage than the previous attack.  Creates a corpse on death.
